title: Maintenance Procedures
description: Standard procedures for maintaining the Antigravity Agent Factory repository

preCommitSynchronization.description: To keep documentation, artifacts, and counts in sync, the following scripts MUST be run before committing changes.

steps.name: Version Synchronization
steps.description: Ensures the factory version from CHANGELOG.md is propagated to all relevant files.

steps.name: Knowledge Counts
steps.description: Updates knowledge file counts in manifest.json and documentation.

steps.name: README Structure
steps.description: Validates and updates the project structure and counts in README.md.

steps.name: Unified Artifact Sync
steps.description: Runs the configuration-driven sync system for various artifacts and tables.

steps.name: Catalog Generation
steps.description: Regenerates the CATALOG.md to include any new agents, skills, or blueprints.

steps.name: Artifact Index Update
steps.description: Updates the fast-lookup cache for artifacts. Optional but recommended.

verification.description: After running these scripts, run `git status` to see if any files were modified. If so, include them in your commit.
